string.text: Kill Gunslinger.
Find Gunslinger.
Find artifact.
Find your first artifact.
Find the first artifact.
Deliver the artifact to the trader.
Help the wounded.
Find the person who survived after the firing and help him.
Find and bring artifact from gravity anomaly.
Trader needs any artifact from gravity anomaly.
Find artifact. You can get it, if you lure someone into the anomaly.
Bring artifact to the trader.
Deliver the information to the trader.
Help the trader obtain the information on the reconnaissance.
Meet the stalker called “Fox”.
Deliver the information from the trader to “Fox”.
Steal the case from army post.
Steal case with important documents from army post commander.
Steal the case from army post.
Bring case to the trader.
Get dynamite for the Wolf.
Collect dynamite from the bandits on the factory and take it to the Wolf.
Meet with the Wolf’s team.
Find the dynamite on the factory
Deliver the dynamite to the Wolf.
Meet stalker on the dump.
Meet stalker in the garage on the dump and get information about Gunslinger`s clan.
Get militaries’ documents from “Agroprom” research institute.
Get military documents from “Agroprom” and deliver them to barman in stalkers’ bar.
Get military documents from “Agroprom” research institute.
Deliver the documents to barman in Stalker bar.
Meet Gunslinger's grouping.
You found out, that some stalkers gather on the abandoned factory near “Agroprom” institute. They may lead you to Gunslinger.
Find the secret cache of Gunslinger’s grouping.
Find and search the cache of Gunslinger’s clan. There you may get information, where to find Gunslinger himself.

Hand over the package to the merchant.
Hand over the package to the trader. It may help you.
